title: Rainy city street driving with moderate speed and braking.
caption: The ego vehicle is driving on a rainy city street, slowing down and braking at two points.

reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed because of the rainy conditions. It slows down and brakes at two points, possibly due to the presence of other vehicles or pedestrians. The rainy weather and the presence of other vehicles and pedestrians require the driver to be attentive and responsive to the changing conditions on the road.
